(pleas my new bot could help you some much)
  ----- Original Message ----- =

  From: Yanshosh@... 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, Octobe=
r 13, 2000 11:16 AM
  Subject: Re: Aproaching the Alliance base...


  Cong=
rats on the football game, KSL!

  If you want to join a battle, Airshadow,=
 DevilDuer can lead your new 
  bot to the one at the Alliance base.

  ::Z=
ardus/Bloodystrike/DevilDuer/Havoc::

  Zardus growls, looking at the attac=
king group. "Kill them," he 
  replies to Bloody Hammer.

  "We are under a=
ttack. Engage and kill all the invaders," he says to 
  Scattershot, Nemesi=
s, Serpentor, and Unitron as he takes careful aim, 
  firing his plasma lau=
ncher at Shockaract.
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  Bloodystrike flies in behind=
 Shockaract's group, recieving Zardus' 
  orders. He takes out his rocket l=
auncher, firing it at Airbomber.
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  DevilDuer stops =
in his tracks, his face breaking into a smile as he 
  recieves Zardus' tra=
nsmission. Battle was good, better than chasing 
  some bot.

  He nearly c=
rashes into the pod before he sees it, stopping a few 
  inches in front of=
 it (Airshadow's new char). He smiles, looking at 
  it and waiting for it =
to scan a beast mode.
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  Havoc nods, checking his in=
ternal scanner as he looks at Chaos and 
  Minion.

  "Gunfire! There's a b=
attle at the nearest base," he suddenly says, 
  his eyes lighting up at th=
e thought of battle, "Let's go."

  He transforms into his Ju 87 Stuka (Ger=
man WW2 jet, the one with the 
  sirens), flying off toward the Alliance ba=
se. Repressor, transforming 
  into an attack chopper, follows after him.

=


  --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
  > Burning =
Hammer ran outside and looked off and seen Shokaract's team.
  > 
  > "Look=
s like they are just standing there, not doing anything, maybe 
  they are
=
  > peaceful? I hope not." Burning Hammer says. Airbomber and Time Warp 
  =
slowly
  > walk up to the Alliance base, and come right up to Burning Hamme=
r.
  > 
  > "I await orders good old fearless leader." Burning Hammer says =

  through
  > commlink to Zardus. Time Warp started to say something and t=
hen 
  fired a bolt
  > into Burning Hammer's head. Burning Hammer falls an=
d lays there. 
  Time Warp
  > aims at the base, but is knocked over. Burni=
ng Hammer is up and 
  punching
  > away at him. Airbomber points his gun a=
t the back of Burning 
  Hammer's head.
  > Burning Hammer swings his hand =
and knocks it across the landscape. 
  Hefires a
  > fireball into Airbombe=
r and blasts him backwards. Burning hammer 
  beats on
  > Time Warp until =
he's bloody, and then stands up.
  > 
  > "Still awaiting orders, what shou=
ld I do with these here 2?" 
  Burning Hammer
  > asks Zardus...
